member.name: ImageFlags
member.summary: The ImageFlags enumeration specifies the attributes of the pixel data contained in anImage object. The method returns an element of this enumeration.

member.name: ImageFlags.ImageFlagsScalable
member.summary: Specifies that the image can be scaled.

member.name: ImageFlags.ImageFlagsHasAlpha
member.summary: Specifies that the pixel data contains alpha values.

member.name: ImageFlags.ImageFlagsHasTranslucent
member.summary: Specifies that the pixel data has alpha values other than 0 (transparent) and 255 (opaque).

member.name: ImageFlags.ImageFlagsPartiallyScalable
member.summary: Specifies that the pixel data is partially scalable with some limitations.

member.name: ImageFlags.ImageFlagsColorSpaceRGB
member.summary: Specifies that the image is stored using an RGB color space.

member.name: ImageFlags.ImageFlagsColorSpaceCMYK
member.summary: Specifies that the image is stored using a CMYK color space.

member.name: ImageFlags.ImageFlagsColorSpaceGRAY
member.summary: Specifies that the image is a grayscale image.

member.name: ImageFlags.ImageFlagsColorSpaceYCBCR
member.summary: Specifies that the image is stored using a YCBCR color space.

member.name: ImageFlags.ImageFlagsColorSpaceYCCK
member.summary: Specifies that the image is stored using a YCCK color space.

member.name: ImageFlags.ImageFlagsHasRealDPI
member.summary: Specifies that dots per inch information is stored in the image.

member.name: ImageFlags.ImageFlagsHasRealPixelSize
member.summary: Specifies that the pixel size is stored in the image.

member.name: ImageFlags.ImageFlagsReadOnly
member.summary: Specifies that the pixel data is read-only.

member.name: ImageFlags.ImageFlagsCaching
member.summary: Specifies that the pixel data can be cached for faster access.
